attributes.action: Halt Britain's Arms Exports to Israel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Halt Britain's Arms Exports to Israel and try to  persuade our EU Counterparts to do the same in view of their totally ignoring the UN Resolution asking for an immediate ceasefire to their War in Gaza where they appear to be in contravention of the EU Licensing Criteria as they are reported to have used illegal cluster munitions and white phosphorus.
In 2007 GB approved £6m of Arms Exports to Israel (despite the above use in Lebanon) it licensed sales 12 times as fast, £20m in the first three months of 2008.   This Heinous Trade Must Stop

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
